title: So, I Got To Thinking
author: verias
text:
It's not often that we really see William, especially lately. I decided, ultimately, that we needed some beefcake.

So, here we see how William is able to maintain his crazy physique, and how, most likely, he spends all his spare time. So, drinks and weights. That's his big secret.

Still eager for more ideas. See you guys on Thursday.

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: Kinda have this picture in my head of him with a dumbel in one hand and a mug in the other now.
